data.title: Panzer General: Allied Assault
data.meta_description: Go to GamingNexus.com for news and reviews on video games, consoles, and PCs.
data.text:
by: Jake -

More On: Panzer General: Allied Assault

Ubisoft has announced a brand new, Xbox Live Arcade-exclusive World War II era strategy title, and latest game in the Panzer General series: Panzer General: Allied Assault. Panzer General costs 800 Microsoft points on Live, and gives you, the player, the ability to re-write history, and the outcome of World War II, giving you control of the German Panzer divisions, to fight back the Allies and defend Germany. So head on over to the Xbox Live Arcade, and grab your copy!
